Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.Ignatov.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.Ignatov.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements Impler, JarImpler
Class for the common functionality of Impler and JarImpler. The class Implementor includes methods for generating of the interfaces implementation and making the jar files.
Author:
Ignatov Nikolay
See Also:
  • ImplementorRunner
  • Impler
  • JarImpler

  • Field Details

    • NEW_LINE

      private static final String NEW_LINE
      A constant for line separation. On UNIX systems, the value is "\n"; on Microsoft Windows systems it is "\r\n"

      A constant for tabulation with value "\t"

    • DOUBLE_NEW_LINE

      private static final String DOUBLE_NEW_LINE
      A constant for double newline. On UNIX systems, the value is "\n\n"; on Microsoft Windows systems it is "\r\n\r\n"

  • Method Details

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: Impler
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class classes name should be same as classes name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: JarImpler
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class classes name should be same as classes name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementClassSignature

      private void implementClassSignature(Class<?> token, BufferedWriter bufferedWriter, String packageName) throws IOException
      Writes the package name and signature of the implementing class to the implementing class file.
      Parameters:
      token - type token of class or interface to write implementing class signature for
      bufferedWriter - writer to the implementing class file
      packageName - name of the implementing class package
      Throws:
      IOException - when errors occurred while writing to the file
      See Also:
      • Class
      • BufferedWriter

    • getOutputFile

      private File getOutputFile(Path root, String packageName, String simpleName) throws IOException
      Creates the implementing class file and all necessary directories for it using the provided path.
      Parameters:
      root - path to the project directory.
      packageName - package name of the interface or class to generate implementation for.
      simpleName - the class or interface name to generate implementation for.
      Returns:
      Implementing class file.
      Throws:
      IOException - when output file with specified path can not be created.
      See Also:
      • Path

    • getArguments

      private static String getArguments(Executable executable, boolean fullSignature)
      Serializes executable arguments.
      Parameters:
      executable - executable to serialize its arguments for.
      fullSignature - flag controlling whether to output argument types or not.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the executable arguments. If fullSignature is true, argument types will be printed, otherwise - without the types.
      See Also:
      • Executable

    • getExceptions

      private static String getExceptions(Executable executable)
      Serializes executable exceptions.
      Parameters:
      executable - executable to serialize exceptions which it throws.
      Returns:
      A string representation of exceptions which are thrown. by provided executable or empty string if executable does not throw exceptions.
      See Also:
      • Executable

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This method takes program arguments and produces the implementing class for the input class or interface. With option -jar it additionally makes the jar file for the .class files.
      Parameters:
      args - program arguments. The method expects two or three arguments:
      1. option -jar (additionally)
      2. full class or interface name to generate implementation for
      3. Path to the project directory or jar-file name in case of option -jar
      See Also:
      • ImplementorRunner.run(String[])
